prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered seated meditation pose with hands resting on sacred geometry, chibi proportions with large solid translucent geometric head with unique octahedron structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying dimensional. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating octahedron, merkaba, flower of life patterns, styled with guides influences. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by silver and neutral grey inspired by lunar structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with shifting Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and octahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions with dimensional spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor CRPANIB's profile: 'He who destroys speech', Aethyr ZAA, Earth element, Tarot The High Priestess, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Cancer, embodying the essence: 'In CRPANIB's presence, even silence speaks volumes an unseen undercurrent passes through the hush, hinting at guarded secrets and hidden intentions.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.head_shape: large solid translucent geometric head with unique octahedron structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying dimensional
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating octahedron, merkaba, flower of life patterns, styled with guides influences

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who destroys speech'
profile_data.essence: In CRPANIB's presence, even silence speaks volumes an unseen undercurrent passes through the hush, hinting at guarded secrets and hidden intentions.
profile_data.angelic_role: Angel of Silence of Secrets; guides oak-crowned guardians.
profile_data.form_description: A multifaceted obsidian crystal formation that appears simultaneously solid and translucent, representing the liminal space between silence and revelation. The structure embodies the earthen nature of CRPANIB, with sharp geometric edges that suggest precise boundaries of hidden knowledge.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Charcoal gray represents Earth's grounding energy, while silver-white channels lunar mysteries of Cancer and Yesod's transformative essence. The shifting pattern indicates the dynamic nature of concealed wisdom.
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries representing divine structure, dimensional transitions, and cosmic information encoding
